welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Herndon, a charming city known for its rich history and friendly community. We invite you to explore our beautiful parks, delicious cuisine, and diverse culture. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories in Herndon!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Washington Dulles International Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Washington Dulles International Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Washington Dulles International Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Washington Dulles International Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse D
terminals.description: Concourse D at Washington Dulles International Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse Z
terminals.description: Concourse Z at Washington Dulles International Airport serves international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Montgomery County Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Montgomery County Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and some international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and some international flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free WiFi network for up to 45 minutes.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Potomac Airfield Airport houses all check-in counters, baggage claim, and security checkpoints.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Potomac Airfield Airport is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tipton AAF Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Tipton AAF Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Frederick Municipal Airport is a small but modern facility, offering a comfortable and convenient experience for travelers.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Frederick Municipal Airport provides services and amenities for private and corporate aircraft, including a lounge and flight planning facilities.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.
